verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to Shushan Eduth. Michtam of David, to teach; when he strove with Aram-naharaim and with Aram-zobah, and Joab returned, and smote of Edom in the Valley of Salt twelve thousand. O <S%H430>God<s%> thou hast cast us <S%H2186>off<s%>, thou hast <S%H6555>broken<s%> us <S%H599>down<s%>; Thou hast been angry; oh restore us <S%H7725>again<s%>.
Thou hast made the <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H7493>tremble<s%>; thou hast <S%H6480>rent<s%> <S%H7495>it<s%>: Heal the <S%H7667>breaches<s%> <S%H4131>thereof<s%>; for it shaketh.
Thou hast <S%H7200>showed<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> hard <S%H7186>things<s%>: Thou hast made us to <S%H8248>drink<s%> the <S%H3196>wine<s%> of <S%H8653>staggering<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> a <S%H5251>banner<s%> to them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H5127>thee<s%>, That it may be displayed <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H7189>truth<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
That thy <S%H3039>beloved<s%> may be <S%H2502>delivered<s%>, <S%H3467>Save<s%> with thy right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, and answer <S%H6030>us<s%>.

God <S%H430><s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in his <S%H6944>holiness<s%>: I will <S%H5937>exult<s%>; I will <S%H2505>divide<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>, and mete <S%H4058>out<s%> the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%>.
Gilead <S%H1568><s%> is <S%H4519>mine<s%>, and Manasseh is <S%H669>mine<s%>; Ephraim also is the <S%H4581>defence<s%> of my <S%H7218>head<s%>; <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is my <S%H2710>sceptre<s%>.
Moab <S%H4124><s%> is my <S%H5518>washpot<s%>; Upon <S%H123>Edom<s%> will I <S%H7993>cast<s%> my <S%H5275>shoe<s%>: <S%H6429>Philistia<s%>, shout thou because of <S%H7321>me<s%>.
Who will <S%H2986>bring<s%> me into the <S%H4692>strong<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>? Who hath <S%H5148>led<s%> me unto <S%H123>Edom<s%>?
Hast not <S%H430>thou<s%>, O God, cast us <S%H2186>off<s%>? And thou goest not <S%H3318>forth<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, with our <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.
Give <S%H3051><s%> us <S%H5833>help<s%> against the <S%H6862>adversary<s%>; For <S%H7723>vain<s%> is the <S%H8668>help<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>.
Through <S%H430>God<s%> we shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly<s%>; For he it is that will tread <S%H947>down<s%> our <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>.
